I have been trying to find a job for over a year now, but nothing has worked out. I am starting to lose hope and feel like I will never be able to find a job. Any advice would be greatly appreciated.

Starting a business can be a great way to gain independence and control over one's career path. However, it is important to thoroughly research and plan before taking the leap. Consider seeking guidance from a business coach or mentor, as well as creating a detailed business plan and financial projections. Additionally, networking within your industry and building relationships with potential customers or clients can help generate leads and grow your business.
